talents.name: Accustomed to Crowds
effects: Crowds do not count as Difficult Terrain for hivers
When Running or Charging through a dense crowd, hivers take no penalty to the Agility Test to keep their feet

talents.name: Basic Weapon Training (Las)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Basic Weapon Training (SP)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Caves of Steel
effects: Hivers treat the Tech-Use (Int) skill as a Basic Skill

talents.name: Crack Shot
effects: You are able to target your shots at the places where they will inflict more harm
When your ranged attack deals Critical Damage, you deal an extra 2 points

talents.name: Deadeye Shot
effects: You always hit an opponent right between the eyes... or wherever else you intended to hit him
When making a Called Shot, you take only a –10 penalty instead of the normal –20

talents.name: Heightened Senses (Hearing)
effects: You gain a +10 bonus to any Tests involving this sense

talents.name: Heightened Senses (Sight)
effects: You gain a +10 bonus to any Tests involving this sense

talents.name: Hivebound
effects: Hivers take a –10 penalty to all Survival (Int) Tests
While out of a “proper hab” (e.g. places without manufactured goods, solid ceilings and electrical power) the hiver takes a –5 penalty to all Intelligence Tests

talents.name: Melee Weapon Training (Primitive)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Mighty Shot
effects: You know how to blast away with a gun to cause the most damage to a target
You add +2 to Damage you inflict with a ranged weapon

talents.name: Pistol Training (SP)
effects: No penalty to use these weapons

talents.name: Unremarkable
effects: You have a forgettable face and are able to blend in with a crowd
Attempts to notice you when amongst other people or anyone attempting to describe you or recall details about you incurs a –20 penalty

talents.name: Wary
effects: All hivers gain a +1 bonus to Initiative rolls
